caption.p: Seasonality of VC for 13 selected cities for Ae. aegypti (a) and Ae. albopictus (b). VC was averaged over the recent 10-year period (2004–2013) for each month of the year. DTR was included and m max = 1.5 where m is the female vector to human population ratio. CRU-TS3.22 monthly gridded (0.5 × 0.5°) temperature data ( Jones et al., n.d.) were used.
